isis.stitle: 6 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS INTERNATIONAL MODEL ES52-7A AND ESO65-7A 6-PLUS - TROUBLESHOOTING - CHECK FUNCTIONING PRIOR TO DISASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: CHECK FUNCTIONING PRIOR TO DISASSEMBLY
svcproc.para: If a remote control is used, a careful check of the remote and connecting linkage (and their adjustment) must he made. The remote unit must be in good working order if the transmission is expected to shift satisfactorily.

Many times, the answer to the trouble is apparent when the unit is inspected prior to disassembly. But this evidence is often lost when the parts are separated. If possible, check the unit prior to disassembly. Bear in mind that a careful inspection of the unit should be made as each disassembly step is performed.
